PrecisOrder establishing an Advisory Committee, to be known as the COMPETITION POLICY REVIEW PANEL, composed of the following persons appointed by the Minister of Industry to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis: (a) Lynton Ronald Wilson of Oakville, Ontario, Chairperson; (b) N.
